result.title: The consortiums methodological handbook (outlining its detailed approach)
result.description: An handbook documenting the SIENNA approaches for ethical analysis, legal and human rights analysis, the study of societal acceptance and awareness, stakeholder analysis and public engagement approach, and the analysis and development of research ethics protocols and professional ethical codes (tasks 1.1 through 1.5), as well as their benefits, limitations and challenges.

result.description: D4.3 a), b) and c): Engagement and empowerment report for collaborative learning (LEG, R, PU, M12, M24, M33). M33 This report presents the intermediate results of citizen engagement documenting the number of activities (e.g. Air Quality days, school project), people involved, training and dissemination material provided, etc in the three testbeds.
